Credits & Acknowledgments

Open source technologies powering birdbird
‚Üê Back to Highlights

Birdbird is built on the shoulders of giants. This project would not be possible without the incredible work of the open source community. We gratefully acknowledge the following projects and their contributors.

Project Purpose License
Core ML & Computer Vision
YOLOv8 State-of-the-art object detection model for real-time bird detection AGPL-3.0
COCO Dataset Pre-trained model weights for object detection including bird class CC BY 4.0
OpenCV Video frame extraction, image processing, and quality analysis Apache 2.0
Video Processing
FFmpeg Video segment extraction, concatenation, and crossfade transitions LGPL 2.1+
Python Libraries
Typer Command-line interface framework with intuitive argument parsing MIT
tqdm Progress bars for batch processing operations MIT / MPL 2.0
boto3 AWS SDK for Python, used for Cloudflare R2 object storage uploads Apache 2.0
Python Programming language runtime and standard library PSF License
Infrastructure & Hosting
Cloudflare R2 S3-compatible object storage for highlights and frame images Commercial Service
Cloudflare Workers Serverless platform for hosting the web viewer application Commercial Service
This Project
birdbird Bird feeder video analysis pipeline and web viewer GPL-3.0
Made with appreciation for the open source community
